sentences.en: Can James ride a bicycle yet?
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯会骑自行车了吗？

sentences.en: Each year they compete in a prominent statewide bicycle race.
sentences.cn: 每年他们都要参加著名的全州自行车大赛。
你有看见过我的自行车吗？

sentences.en: He got off his bicycle and left the room.
He got on his bicycle and rode off.
He lent his bicycle to me.
sentences.cn: 他把自行车借给我用了。

sentences.en: He rode to work on a bicycle.
He was covered with bruises after falling off his bicycle.
sentences.cn: 他从自行车上摔了下来,摔得浑身伤痕.

sentences.en: I am not keen for her to have a bicycle.
sentences.cn: 我不太放心她有辆自行车。
奥斯卡有一辆新自行车。

sentences.en: Our son has just graduated from a tricycle to a proper bicycle.
sentences.cn: 我们的儿子刚刚从骑三轮车过渡到骑普通自行车.

sentences.en: The bicycle lay upended in a ditch.
sentences.cn: 自行车翻倒在一条小水沟里。

sentences.en: The bicycle reigned supreme as Britain's most popular mode of transport.
sentences.cn: 当时自行车是英国最流行的交通工具。

sentences.en: The bicycle saddle is too high for this child.
sentences.cn: 这辆自行车车座对这孩子来说太高了.

sentences.en: The height of the bicycle seat is adjustable.
sentences.cn: 这辆自行车车座的高度可以调节。

sentences.en: the prototype of the modern bicycle
We went on long bicycle rides together.
sentences.cn: 我们一起骑自行车长途旅行。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 气汞；自行车打气筒

trans.tran_en: a vehicle with two wheels that you ride by pushing its  pedal s  with your feet
